statements: SELECT * FROM LegalData
SELECT case_name, lawyer_name FROM LegalData
SELECT case_name, case_description, case_date FROM LegalData WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court'
SELECT lawyer_name, court_name FROM LegalData ORDER BY case_date DESC
SELECT * FROM LegalData WHERE case_name LIKE '%criminal%'
SELECT * FROM LegalData WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT case_name, lawyer_name, court_name FROM LegalData WHERE case_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM LegalData WHERE lawyer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_description FROM LegalData WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court';
SELECT case_id, lawyer_name, case_date FROM LegalData ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM legal_documents;
SELECT id, document_text FROM legal_documents ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT document_text, document_type FROM legal_documents WHERE date_published >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM case_trials WHERE outcome = 'Guilty';
SELECT lawyer_name, trial_date FROM case_trials ORDER BY trial_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM legal_documents WHERE document_type = 'Contract' AND date_published >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, document_text FROM legal_documents ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM legal_documents WHERE document_text LIKE '%confidential%' AND date_published < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY date_published DESC
SELECT document_type, COUNT(*) AS document_count FROM legal_documents GROUP BY document_type HAVING document_count > 5
SELECT l.id, l.document_text, t.lawyer_name FROM legal_documents l JOIN case_trials t ON l.id = t.case_id WHERE t.outcome = 'Won' ORDER BY l.id
SELECT * FROM lawyer_cases;
SELECT case_name, case_date FROM lawyer_cases;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM client_details;
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type FROM legal_documents;
SELECT * FROM legal_documents ORDER BY document_date DESC;
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_date, client_id FROM lawyer_cases WHERE case_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM client_details WHERE client_phone LIKE '555%';
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM legal_documents WHERE document_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY document_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM client_details ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT case_name, client_id FROM lawyer_cases JOIN client_details ON lawyer_cases.client_id = client_details.client_id;
SELECT * FROM Cases;
SELECT case_name, case_type FROM Cases ORDER BY case_name DESC;
SELECT lawyer_name, lawyer_specialty FROM Lawyers WHERE lawyer_firm = 'ABC Law Firm';
SELECT document_name FROM LegalDocuments WHERE document_type = 'Contract' LIMIT 3;
SELECT client_name, client_address FROM Clients WHERE client_contact LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM Cases;
SELECT case_name, case_status FROM Cases WHERE case_status = 'Open';
SELECT lawyer_name, lawyer_specialty FROM Lawyers ORDER BY lawyer_specialty DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_address FROM Clients WHERE client_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM LegalDocuments WHERE document_type = 'Contract' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM LegalCases;
SELECT case_name, case_date FROM LegalCases ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_type FROM Clients WHERE client_type='Corporate';
SELECT lawyer_name, lawyer_specialty, lawyer_experience FROM Lawyers ORDER BY lawyer_experience ASC;
SELECT decision_id, decision_date, decision_text FROM CourtDecisions WHERE decision_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM LegalCases;
SELECT lawyer_name, lawyer_specialty FROM Lawyers ORDER BY lawyer_experience DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_contact_info FROM Clients WHERE client_type='Corporate';
SELECT decision_text, decision_date FROM CourtDecisions WHERE decision_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT case_name, action_description, action_date FROM CaseHistory JOIN LegalCases ON CaseHistory.case_id = LegalCases.case_id ORDER BY action_date ASC;
